name: Marincess Blue Tang
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Marincess" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Marincess Blue Tang". If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Link Summon of a WATER monster: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Marincess" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Marincess Blue Tang" once per turn.
